snippet: More than 600 medical workers have been killed in Syria’s civil war in deliberate and indiscriminate attacks, most of them by government forces, an international rights group announced Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: More than 600 medical workers have been killed in Syria’s civil war in deliberate and indiscriminate attacks, most of them by government forces, an international rights group announced Wednesday.

headline.main: Syria: Doctors’ Group Blames Government for Most Attacks on Medical Workers
headline.print_headline: Syria: Doctors’ Group Blames Government for Most Attacks on Medical Workers

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
